amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit the use of federal funds to carry out the recommendations of the Naming Commission.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of federal funds to carry out the recommendations of the Naming Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 253 (Roll no. 316).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Good (VA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 253 (Roll no. 316).
